column5: Just looked at the 5 day forecast for Kenora....take a look at the current weather sat image up there...there are 3 big storms up there....it will either really help (rain) the fire problem or, could really make it worse (lightning). Either way, it looks U-G-L-Y
What site do you use. i am heading up on Friday and one site says high 80's all week for Ear Falls and another mid 70's?
weather dot com and enter Kenora.It looks OK for you on Friday and next week looks OK so far.Good Luck !!!

There are several www.accuweather.com this will give it to you in English or cel. www.theweathernetwork.com www.weather.com most of the time they are all within several degree of each other. Have a safe trip.

I check the weather before going up there every year on about 3 different sites. One thing is for sure, the weather forecasted is never the weather I get when I'm up there. Its a crap shoot. They can sure use the rain right now though.
Leave the rain gear at home. Bring a gas-mask!

Heading up Friday to Ear Falls, any word on the bite following a mild cold front. High's in Ear Falls on Saturday and Sunday in the mid to upper 60's. Anyone tell me what depth the fish are holding?Thanks in advance,Mark
I agree about the weather never the same.....I can't remember it being what they said it would be???? Get the normal high and low and expect rain some days, that's a safe bet.
It's cooling off tomorrow.......weather looks good into the next week.
